Articles.Content:
Hello,

I will be taking requests for some "expert photoshop" (paint.net lol) done on your favorite screenshot! What I am doing is adding stunning backgrounds to screenshots of KSP. This is not professional work, more of a fun thing I want to try.

If you would like me to add a stunning background to a screenshot of yours, just submit your screenshot you want altered and a photo of the background you would like me to add to the screenshot, or criteria for a background you would like me to use.

Note:

-This is not the HIGHEST quality, as I lack the programs to do so, but I will give it my best shot!

-Backgrounds used are not of my own creation, they are from the internet, unless you submit one you would like me to implement.

-I will try my best to keep up with the demand (if any lol)

Here are some samples of my work:

Edited February 2, 2014 by SpenSpaceCorp
I love these! Could you photoshop my Minmus lander? I'll leave the background up to you. Thanks!

These are pretty epic looking! I'm learning Photoshop myself, I've never experimented with Kerbal 'shops before, though.

Mostly face swapping.

Face swapping is funny.
Here is your "Kerbalshopped" picture Thomas988, with a few different backgrounds I put in! Hope you enjoy!
I like the third one- having all the nebula gases in the others make it a bit to in your face-y for me
Oh wow! Thanks so much! These are amazing!
Thanks for the compliment and you're welcome!
